## Type of Change

<!-- Mark the relevant option with an 'x' -->

- [ ] `content` - New or updated documentation/guides
- [ ] `fix` - Correction to existing content
- [ ] `feat` - New site feature or component
- [ ] `style` - Styling/CSS changes
- [ ] `chore` - Build process, dependencies, or tooling

## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

- [ ] I have tested my changes locally (`npx quartz build --serve`)
- [ ] My content follows the style guidelines in CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] Links and images work correctly
- [ ] I have added appropriate tags/frontmatter (if adding content)
